app_metadata.description: The qBittorrent project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to mTorrent.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for qBittorrent.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that qBittorrent files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that qBittorrent files will be owned by.

attrs.label: WebUI Port
attrs.description: The port for qBittorrent WebUI

attrs.label: BT Port
attrs.description: The port for qBittorrent BT (Both TCP and UDP)

attrs.label: Use HTTPS Probe
attrs.description:
Use HTTPS probe for the qBittorrent Web UI. </br>
This will ONLY affect the probes, only enable this if you
configured HTTPS in the qBittorrent Web UI.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: qBittorrent Config Storage
attrs.description: The path to store qBittorrent Config.

attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

1.0.18.readme:
qBittorrent

The qBittorrent project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to µTorrent.
